trans-unit.target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_DEFAULT_TALK_1<tab>Greetings! I take it you have come to see me about a retainer.

TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_DEFAULT_TALK_2<tab>Retainers are hardworking lads and lasses who will help you to manage those spoils earned while off slaying dragons or whatever it is you adventurers do.

TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_DEFAULT_TALK_3<tab>Unfortunately, you do not appear you could even slay an eft, let alone a dragon, therefore I must decline any petition you may have to take a retainer into your employ.

TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_DEFAULT_TALK_4<tab>Build yourself a reputation in this city, however, and I shall provide you with whatever it is you need. Might I suggest you start by heading back to the Adventurers' Guild and seeing if someone there has work for you?
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_MAIN_MENU_TITLE<tab>What would you like to do?
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_MAIN_MENU_TALK<tab>Small Talk.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_MAIN_MENU_CREATE<tab>Hire a retainer.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_MAIN_MENU_REMOVE<tab>Release a retainer.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_MAIN_MENU_REMAKE<tab>Change a retainer's appearance and nickname.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_MAIN_MENU_EXPLANATION<tab>Ask about retainers.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_MAIN_MENU_JOBCHANGE<tab>Inquire about retainer jobs.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_MAIN_MENU_CHECK_CASHBACK<tab>View market tax rates.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_MAIN_MENU_CANCEL<tab>Nothing.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_MAIN_MENU_REGISTER_LIMSA<tab>Dispatch a retainer to Limsa Lominsa.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_MAIN_MENU_REGISTER_GRIDANIA<tab>Dispatch a retainer to Gridania.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_MAIN_MENU_REGISTER_ULDAH<tab>Dispatch a retainer to Ul'dah.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_MAIN_MENU_REGISTER_ISHGARD<tab>Dispatch a retainer to Ishgard.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_MAIN_MENU_REGISTER_TOWN40<tab>Dispatch a retainer to Kugane.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_MAIN_MENU_REGISTER_OLDSHARLAYAN<tab>Dispatch a retainer to Old Sharlayan.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_EXPLANATION_MENU_TITLE<tab>What will you ask?
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_EXPLANATION_MENU_WHAT_IS<tab>Who are retainers?
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_EXPLANATION_MENU_ABOUT<tab>What services can retainers provide?
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_EXPLANATION_MENU_CALL<tab>How do I summon a retainer?
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_MAIN_MENU_BACK<tab>Nothing

TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ABOUT_TALK_01<tab>Retainers are men and women who offer their services in exchange for coin. Though they're seldom as sharp as adventurers like yourself, they're no strangers to life's more menial tasks─tasks which your lot might not think worth your time.

TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ABOUT_TALK_02<tab>Retainers can provide a host of different services, from tending your items to protecting your gil. Oh, and you need not worry about providing recompense for a retainer's services, for the Adventurers' Guild will not only cover his salary, but also replace anything that goes missing, should you wake up to find your belongings gone and your retainer nowhere to be found.

TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ITEMS_GIL_TALK_01<tab>Another job retainers are often asked to perform is the tending of items placed up for sale in the markets─something many adventurers cannot be bothered to do themselves.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ITEMS_GIL_TALK_02<tab>If you wish to experience the market for yourself, I ask that you seek out one of the nearby boards.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_CALL_TALK_01<tab>Retainers in your employ can be summoned at any time using special bells like the one nearby.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_CALL_TALK_02<tab>Summoning bells can also be found around the realm in oft-visited locations such as city markets and inns.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_CASHBACK_ASK_TITLE<tab>Current Market Tax Rates:
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_CASHBACK_ASK_LIMSA<tab>Limsa Lominsa: Reduced
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_CASHBACK_ASK_LIMSA_NONE<tab>Limsa Lominsa: Normal
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_CASHBACK_ASK_GRIDANIA<tab>Gridania: Reduced
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_CASHBACK_ASK_GRIDANIA_NONE<tab>Gridania: Normal
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_CASHBACK_ASK_ULDAH<tab>Ul'dah: Reduced
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_CASHBACK_ASK_ULDAH_NONE<tab>Ul'dah: Normal
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_CASHBACK_ASK_ISHGARD<tab>Ishgard: Reduced
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_CASHBACK_ASK_ISHGARD_NONE<tab>Ishgard: Normal
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_CASHBACK_ASK_TOWN40<tab>Kugane: Reduced
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_CASHBACK_ASK_TOWN40_NONE<tab>Kugane: Normal
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_CASHBACK_ASK<tab><var 28 ((Town)) E80201 /var>: Reduced
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_CASHBACK_ASK_NONE<tab><var 28 ((Town)) E80201 /var>: Normal

TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_CASHBACK_LIMSA<tab>Tax on items sold in the Limsa Lominsa markets is reduced to <var 20 E803 /var>% until <var 07 E804 /var><var 08 E4E94E04 (( <var 20 DC /var>/<var 20 DE /var>/<var 20 DF /var>)) ((<var 20 DE /var>/<var 20 DC /var>/<var 20 DF /var>)) /var> (Earth date).

TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_CASHBACK_GRIDANIA<tab>Tax on items sold in the Gridania markets is reduced to <var 20 E803 /var>% until <var 07 E804 /var><var 08 E4E94E04 (( <var 20 DC /var>/<var 20 DE /var>/<var 20 DF /var>)) ((<var 20 DE /var>/<var 20 DC /var>/<var 20 DF /var>)) /var> (Earth date).

TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_CASHBACK_ULDAH<tab>Tax on items sold in the Ul'dah markets is reduced to <var 20 E803 /var>% until <var 07 E804 /var><var 08 E4E94E04 (( <var 20 DC /var>/<var 20 DE /var>/<var 20 DF /var>)) ((<var 20 DE /var>/<var 20 DC /var>/<var 20 DF /var>)) /var> (Earth date).

TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_CASHBACK_ISHGARD<tab>Tax on items sold in the Ishgard markets is reduced to <var 20 E803 /var>% until <var 07 E804 /var><var 08 E4E94E04 (( <var 20 DC /var>/<var 20 DE /var>/<var 20 DF /var>)) ((<var 20 DE /var>/<var 20 DC /var>/<var 20 DF /var>)) /var> (Earth date).

TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_CASHBACK_TOWN40<tab>Tax on items sold in the Kugane markets is reduced to <var 20 E803 /var>% until <var 07 E804 /var><var 08 E4E94E04 (( <var 20 DC /var>/<var 20 DE /var>/<var 20 DF /var>)) ((<var 20 DE /var>/<var 20 DC /var>/<var 20 DF /var>)) /var> (Earth date).

TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_CASHBACK<tab>Tax on items sold in the <var 28 ((Town)) E80201 /var> markets is reduced to <var 20 E805 /var>% until <var 07 E803 /var><var 08 E4E94E04 (( <var 20 DC /var>/<var 20 DE /var>/<var 20 DF /var>)) ((<var 20 DE /var>/<var 20 DC /var>/<var 20 DF /var>)) /var> (Earth date).
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_NO_CASHBACK_LIMSA<tab>Tax on items sold in the Limsa Lominsa markets is the normal rate of <var 20 E802 /var>%.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_NO_CASHBACK_GRIDANIA<tab>Tax on items sold in the Gridania markets is the normal rate of <var 20 E802 /var>%.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_NO_CASHBACK_ULDAH<tab>Tax on items sold in the Ul'dah markets is the normal rate of <var 20 E802 /var>%.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_NO_CASHBACK_ISHGARD<tab>Tax on items sold in the Ishgard markets is the normal rate of <var 20 E802 /var>%.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_NO_CASHBACK_TOWN40<tab>Tax on items sold in the Kugane markets is the normal rate of <var 20 E802 /var>%.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_NO_CASHBACK<tab>Tax on items sold in the <var 28 ((Town)) E80201 /var> markets is the normal rate of <var 20 E803 /var>%.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_CASHBACK_ASK_ABOUT<tab>Learn about Market Tax
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_CASHBACK_EXPLANATION<tab>To make their markets more attractive to prospective sellers, cities will often lower the percentage of tax that is collected from each sale.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_CASHBACK_CAUTION<tab>Reduced tax rate periods can end earlier than indicated if areas require maintenance.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_CREATE_TALK_01<tab>According to our records, you may hire up to <var 20 E802 /var> retainers.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_NO_RETAINERS_TALK<tab>Currently, you have no retainers in your employ.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_HAVE_RETAINERS_TALK<tab>Currently, you have <var 20 E802 /var> <var 08 E4E80202 ((retainer)) ((retainers)) /var> in your employ.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_CUSTOMIZE_WARNING<tab>While customizing your retainer, you will be unable to communicate with players and engage in other activities.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_CUSTOMIZE_TALK<tab>Excellent. We have quite a few men and women on our lists, so I invite you to describe the retainer you desire, down to the most minute detail.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_DUTY_FINDER_WARNING<tab>Beginning the retainer customization process will automatically cancel your Duty Finder registration.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_DUTY_FINDER_CONFIRM<tab>Withdraw duty registration and hire a retainer?

TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_PERSONALITY_TALK<tab>I can think of several retainers that are exactly as you describe. Oddly enough, they have strikingly different personalities. If you would be so kind as to state a preference, it would be most helpful.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_PERSONALITY_TITLE<tab>Select your retainer's personality.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_PERSONALITY_CHEERFUL<tab>Polite.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_PERSONALITY_WILD<tab>Rough.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_PERSONALITY_COOLHEADED<tab>Serious.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_PERSONALITY_CAREFREE<tab>Carefree.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_PERSONALITY_PROBLEMATIC<tab>Independent.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_PERSONALITY_PLAYFUL<tab>Lively.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_CHECK_PERSONALITY_ENTER<tab>Very well, I have just the individual in mind. When summoned, this retainer will greet you just so:
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_CHECK_PERSONALITY_LEAVE<tab>And when dismissed, this retainer will bid you farewell just so:
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_CHECK_PERSONALITY_CONFIRM<tab>Hire this retainer?

TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_NAME_ASK<tab>Excellent. It is also customary to give a retainer an appellation of one's own making─a nickname, as it were. We find this deepens the bond between our clients and their retainers.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_NAME_PROMPT_TITLE<tab>Retainer Nickname
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_NAME_PROMPT_MESSAGE0<tab>Give your retainer a nickname.

TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_NAME_PROMPT_MESSAGE1<tab>Names must be at least 3 characters long and can contain letters, apostrophes, and hyphens. Please note, however, that hyphens cannot be used in succession or placed immediately before or after apostrophes.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_NAME_PROMPT_HEAD<tab>
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_CANCEL_CONFIRM<tab>Are you certain you wish to cancel the hiring process?
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_CREATE_CONFIRM<tab>Hire the services of <var 29 EA02 /var>?
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ASK_CREATE<tab>Hire a retainer?
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ASK_CREATE_YES<tab>Yes
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ASK_CREATE_NO<tab>No
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_CREATING_RETAINER<tab>One moment, please, while I draft the proper documentation.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_CREATE_SUCCESS_01<tab>Congratulations! <var 2B ((<var 29 EA02 /var>)) /var> is now in your employ.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_CREATE_SUCCESS_02<tab>You can summon your new retainer using the nearby bell.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_CREATE_SUCCESS_03<tab>If you have any further questions or requests, please do not hesitate to ask.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_RETAINER_CREATE_FAILED_NAME<tab>The name you have chosen is not available. Please select another.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_RETAINER_CREATE_FULL<tab>I am sorry, but you cannot hire any more retainers.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_RETAINER_CREATE_CANCEL<tab>Understood. If you change your mind, speak with me again.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_REGISTER_TALK_LIMSA_01<tab>Select the retainer you wish to send to the markets in Limsa Lominsa.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_REGISTER_ASK_LIMSA<tab>Send <var 2B ((<var 29 EA02 /var>)) /var> to Limsa Lominsa?
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_REGISTER_SUCCESS_LIMSA<tab><var 2B ((<var 29 EA02 /var>)) /var> has been sent to Limsa Lominsa.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_REGISTER_ALREADY_LIMSA<tab>That retainer is already in Limsa Lominsa.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_REGISTER_TALK_GRIDANIA_01<tab>Select the retainer you wish to send to the markets in Gridania.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_REGISTER_ASK_GRIDANIA<tab>Send <var 2B ((<var 29 EA02 /var>)) /var> to Gridania?
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_REGISTER_SUCCESS_GRIDANIA<tab><var 2B ((<var 29 EA02 /var>)) /var> has been sent to Gridania.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_REGISTER_ALREADY_GRIDANIA<tab>That retainer is already in Gridania.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_REGISTER_TALK_ULDAH_01<tab>Select the retainer you wish to send to the markets in Ul'dah.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_REGISTER_ASK_ULDAH<tab>Send <var 2B ((<var 29 EA02 /var>)) /var> to Ul'dah?
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_REGISTER_SUCCESS_ULDAH<tab><var 2B ((<var 29 EA02 /var>)) /var> has been sent to Ul'dah.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_REGISTER_ALREADY_ULDAH<tab>That retainer is already in Ul'dah.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_REGISTER_TALK_ISHGARD_01<tab>Select the retainer you wish to send to the markets in Ishgard.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_REGISTER_ASK_ISHGARD<tab>Send <var 2B ((<var 29 EA02 /var>)) /var> to Ishgard?
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_REGISTER_SUCCESS_ISHGARD<tab><var 2B ((<var 29 EA02 /var>)) /var> has been sent to Ishgard.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_REGISTER_ALREADY_ISHGARD<tab>That retainer is already in Ishgard.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_REGISTER_TALK_TOWN40_01<tab>Select the retainer you wish to send to the markets in Kugane.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_REGISTER_ASK_TOWN40<tab>Send <var 2B ((<var 29 EA02 /var>)) /var> to Kugane?
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_REGISTER_SUCCESS_TOWN40<tab><var 2B ((<var 29 EA02 /var>)) /var> has been sent to Kugane.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_REGISTER_ALREADY_TOWN40<tab>That retainer is already in Kugane.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_REGISTER_TALK_OLDSHARLAYAN_01<tab>Select the retainer you wish to send to the markets in Old Sharlayan.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_REGISTER_ASK_OLDSHARLAYAN<tab>Send <var 2B ((<var 29 EA02 /var>)) /var> to Old Sharlayan?
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_REGISTER_SUCCESS_OLDSHARLAYAN<tab><var 2B ((<var 29 EA02 /var>)) /var> has been sent to Old Sharlayan.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_REGISTER_ALREADY_OLDSHARLAYAN<tab>That retainer is already in Old Sharlayan.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_REGISTER_ASK_YES<tab>Yes
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_REGISTER_ASK_NO<tab>No

TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_REMAKE_RETAINER_EXPLANATION<tab>You...are dissatisfied with one of your retainers? Very well. If you would be so kind as to inform me which retainer is lacking, we can begin the review process.

TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_REMAKE_RETAINER_TALK<tab>You may change your retainers' nicknames or instruct them to visit the aesthetician at any time. If you desire more drastic changes to a retainer's appearance or personality, the retainer vocate will assist you in finding a replacement of comparable skill and experience.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ASK_REMAKE<tab>Review your specifications for <var 2B ((<var 29 EA02 /var>)) /var>?
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ASK_REMAKE_YES<tab>Yes
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ASK_REMAKE_NO<tab>No

TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_RETAINER_REMAKE_CANCEL<tab>Then you <var 1A 02 /var>are<var 1A 01 /var> completely satisfied with your retainer? Understood. Pray speak with me again should your preferences change.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_DUTY_FINDER_CONFIRM_REMAKE<tab>Withdraw duty registration and review your retainer?

TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_RETAINER_REMAKE_TALK<tab>Very well. First, let us review your retainer's current appearance. I must ask that you describe in detail which aspects you find unappealing, and what you would prefer.

TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_PERSONALITY_TALK_REMAKE<tab>I see... Next, I would have you confirm your preference with regards to personality. “The right retainer for the right person,” as we are wont to say.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_CHECK_PERSONALITY_REMAKE_ENTER<tab>To ensure there is no misunderstanding, know that your retainer will address you just so:
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_CHECK_PERSONALITY_CONFIRM_REMAKE<tab>Are you satisfied with this personality?
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_NAME_ASK_REMAKE<tab>Understood. Finally, I must needs verify the nickname you would give your retainer. You may register the same nickname if you like.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_CANCEL_CONFIRM_REMAKE<tab>Are you certain you wish to cancel the review process?
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_REMAKE_CONFIRM<tab>Complete your review of <var 29 EA02 /var>?
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_REMEKE_RETAINER<tab>One moment, please, while I draft the proper documentation.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_EQUIP_HAVE_RETAINER<tab>Forgive me, but you must first instruct your retainer to remove all equipment. A necessary precaution, in light of past incidents.

TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_VENTURE_RETAINER<tab>Our records indicate that your retainer is currently undertaking a venture. Until that is no longer the case, I fear we cannot begin the review process.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_RETAINER_REMAKE_FAILED<tab>Due to unforeseen circumstances, we cannot review your retainer at this time.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_REMAKE_SUCCESS_01<tab>I am pleased to inform you that your review has been processed, and <var 29 EA02 /var> is now ready to serve you.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_REMAKE_SUCCESS_02<tab>You can summon your retainer using the nearby bell.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_REMOVE_RETAINER_EXPLANATION<tab>Very well. Allow me a moment to locate your documentation.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_NO_RETAINERS_AVAILABLE<tab>It does not appear you have any retainers in your employ at this time.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_REMOVE_RETAINER_TALK<tab>Confirm the retainer you wish to release.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ASK_REMOVE<tab>Release <var 2B ((<var 29 EA02 /var>)) /var>?
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ASK_REMOVE_HASHOUSE<tab>Release <var 2B ((<var 29 EA02 /var>)) /var>? Please be advised that retainers placed in estates will not be automatically removed.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ASK_REMOVE_YES<tab>Yes
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ASK_REMOVE_NO<tab>No
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_RETAINER_REMOVE_SUCCESS<tab><var 2B ((<var 29 EA02 /var>)) /var> is released from service.

TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_RETAINER_REMOVE_FAILED_INVENTORY<tab>Our records show that the retainer you wish to release is still in possession of several of your belongings, and may have placed a number of them for sale on the market. You must retrieve those belongings before I can approve the dismissal.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_RETAINER_REMOVE_CANCEL<tab>Understood. The retainer shall remain in your employ. Speak with me again if you change your mind.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_JOB_MENU_TITLE<tab>What would you like to do?
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_JOB_MENU_HOWTO<tab>Ask about assigning your retainer a job.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_JOB_MENU_RELATION<tab>Ask about job requirements.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_JOB_MENU_OBTAIN<tab>Purchase a copy of <var 1A 02 /var>Modern Vocation<var 1A 01 /var>.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_JOB_MENU_CANCEL<tab>Nothing.

TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_JOB_HOWTO_TALK_01<tab>By popular demand, we have prepared an exhaustive publication to aid clients who would have their retainers train in certain ancient or esoteric traditions.

TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_JOB_HOWTO_TALK_02<tab>To assign your retainer a <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>job<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>, you must first obtain <var 31 ((Item)) 02E8020202 /var>, which can be purchased from the retainer vocate for 40 ventures.

TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_JOB_HOWTO_TALK_03<tab>Furthermore, you must have achieved level 50 in the job you wish to assign your retainer. Please note that the jobs you can assign your retainer are determined by their class. Limited jobs are not available.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_JOB_HOWTO_TALK_04<tab>If you wish to assign a level 50 retainer a job which is not currently available, you will need to reset and change their class.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_RELATION_TALK_01<tab>As you may know, a certain measure of experience is required before a retainer may train in a more advanced tradition.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_RELATION_MENU_TITLE<tab>Select a class.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_RELATION_MENU_CLASS<tab><var 2B ((<var 28 ((ClassJob)) E80201 /var>)) /var>.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_RELATION_MENU_CANCEL<tab>Return.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_CONDITIONS_TALK_01<tab>A retainer who has been assigned the <var 28 ((ClassJob)) E80201 /var> class may be eligible to train in the following traditions:
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_CONDITIONS_MENU_TITLE<tab>Select a job.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_CONDITIONS_MENU_CLASS<tab><var 2B ((<var 28 ((ClassJob)) E80201 /var>)) /var>.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_CONDITIONS_MENU_CANCEL<tab>Return.

TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_CONDITIONS_TALK_10<tab>To assign your retainer the <var 28 ((ClassJob)) E80201 /var> job, you yourself must first achieve level 50 as <var 08 E4E8020B ((an <var 28 ((ClassJob)) E80201 /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E8020F ((an <var 28 ((ClassJob)) E80201 /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E80206 ((an <var 28 ((ClassJob)) E80201 /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E8021B ((an <var 28 ((ClassJob)) E80201 /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E80222 ((an <var 28 ((ClassJob)) E80201 /var>)) ((a <var 28 ((ClassJob)) E80201 /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>. Additionally, your retainer must have achieved level 30 as <var 08 E4E8030B ((an <var 28 ((ClassJob)) E80301 /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E8030F ((an <var 28 ((ClassJob)) E80301 /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E80306 ((an <var 28 ((ClassJob)) E80301 /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E8031B ((an <var 28 ((ClassJob)) E80301 /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E80322 ((an <var 28 ((ClassJob)) E80301 /var>)) ((a <var 28 ((ClassJob)) E80301 /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>.

TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_CONDITIONS_TALK_20<tab>To assign your retainer the <var 28 ((ClassJob)) E80201 /var> job, you yourself must first achieve level 50 as <var 08 E4E8020B ((an <var 28 ((ClassJob)) E80201 /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E8020F ((an <var 28 ((ClassJob)) E80201 /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E80206 ((an <var 28 ((ClassJob)) E80201 /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E8021B ((an <var 28 ((ClassJob)) E80201 /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E80222 ((an <var 28 ((ClassJob)) E80201 /var>)) ((a <var 28 ((ClassJob)) E80201 /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>. Additionally, your retainer must have achieved level 50 as a Disciple of War or Magic.

TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_CONDITIONS_TALK_30<tab>To assign your retainer the <var 28 ((ClassJob)) E80201 /var> job, you yourself must first achieve level 60 as <var 08 E4E8020B ((an <var 28 ((ClassJob)) E80201 /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E8020F ((an <var 28 ((ClassJob)) E80201 /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E80206 ((an <var 28 ((ClassJob)) E80201 /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E8021B ((an <var 28 ((ClassJob)) E80201 /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E80222 ((an <var 28 ((ClassJob)) E80201 /var>)) ((a <var 28 ((ClassJob)) E80201 /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>. Additionally, your retainer must have achieved level 60 as a Disciple of War or Magic.

TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_CONDITIONS_TALK_40<tab>To assign your retainer the <var 28 ((ClassJob)) E80201 /var> job, you yourself must first achieve level 70 as <var 08 E4E8020B ((an <var 28 ((ClassJob)) E80201 /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E8020F ((an <var 28 ((ClassJob)) E80201 /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E80206 ((an <var 28 ((ClassJob)) E80201 /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E8021B ((an <var 28 ((ClassJob)) E80201 /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E80222 ((an <var 28 ((ClassJob)) E80201 /var>)) ((a <var 28 ((ClassJob)) E80201 /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>. Additionally, your retainer must have achieved level 70 as a Disciple of War or Magic.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_SCROLL_HAS_ALREADY<tab>Ahem. If I am not mistaken, do you not already have a copy of that publication in your possession?

TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_SCROLL_TALK_01<tab>You already possess a copy of <var 1A 02 /var>Modern Vocation<var 1A 01 /var>. You may summon a retainer and assign them a job, if they meet the necessary requirements.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ASK_SCROLL_TRADE<tab>Exchange 40 ventures for <var 31 ((Item)) 02E8020202 /var>?
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ASK_SCROLL_YES<tab>Yes
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ASK_SCROLL_NO<tab>No
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_SCROLL_FULL_BAG<tab>Unable to obtain <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8020202 /var>. Your inventory is full.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_SCROLL_SHORTAGE_COIN<tab>Unable to purchase <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8020202 /var>. You do not have enough ventures.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_SCROLL_SHORTAGE_EXCHANGE_GUIDE<tab>If you possess a venture promissory note, you may redeem it for ventures through a Calamity salvager.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_TRADE_TALK_01<tab>You exchange 40 ventures for <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8020202 /var>.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_TRADE_TALK_02<tab>You may now summon a retainer and assign them a job, if they meet the necessary requirements.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_HYURAN_MALE_TYPE1<tab>(-Polite Hyuran Male-)I have come, <var 08 E905 ((Mistress)) ((Master)) /var>.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_HYURAN_MALE_TYPE2<tab>(-Rough Hyuran Male-)Nothin' fer ye to worry about.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_HYURAN_MALE_TYPE3<tab>(-Serious Hyuran Male-)You summoned?
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_HYURAN_MALE_TYPE4<tab>(-Carefree Hyuran Male-)Yes? <sigh> I hope this doesn't take long...
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_HYURAN_MALE_TYPE5<tab>(-Independent Hyuran Male-)You wish to see how a master handles a bazaar?
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_HYURAN_MALE_TYPE6<tab>(-Lively Hyuran Male-)Hello, hello! You called?
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_HYURAN_FEMALE_TYPE1<tab>(-Polite Hyuran Female-)At your service, my <var 08 E905 ((lady)) ((lord)) /var>.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_HYURAN_FEMALE_TYPE2<tab>(-Rough Hyuran Female-)What's it to be this time, love?
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_HYURAN_FEMALE_TYPE3<tab>(-Serious Hyuran Female-)What would you ask?
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_HYURAN_FEMALE_TYPE4<tab>(-Carefree Hyuran Female-)I'm so sorry to keep you waiting, <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sir)) /var>. So very, very sorry.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_HYURAN_FEMALE_TYPE5<tab>(-Independent Hyuran Female-)Quickly now, I've places to be.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_HYURAN_FEMALE_TYPE6<tab>(-Lively Hyuran Female-)Well, if it ain't my favorite client! Always a pleasure, <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sir)) /var>!
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_ELEZEN_MALE_TYPE1<tab>(-Polite Elezen Male-)Yes, <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sir)) /var>? What is your bidding?
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_ELEZEN_MALE_TYPE2<tab>(-Rough Elezen Male-)What's on the agenda, chief? Deprivin' saps o' their hard-earned gil?
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_ELEZEN_MALE_TYPE3<tab>(-Serious Elezen Male-)I have come. You may proceed.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_ELEZEN_MALE_TYPE4<tab>(-Carefree Elezen Male-)Oh, hello there. To what do I owe the pleasure?
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_ELEZEN_MALE_TYPE5<tab>(-Independent Elezen Male-)I am come to conduct business, and only business.

TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_ELEZEN_MALE_TYPE6<tab>(-Lively Elezen Male-)You look to be in good health, <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sir)) /var>. How may I assist you this fine <var 08 E3E90C0D ((<var 08 E3E90C05 ((eve)) ((morn)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E3E90C12 ((day)) ((eve)) /var>)) /var>?
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_ELEZEN_FEMALE_TYPE1<tab>(-Polite Elezen Female-)What is it you would have me do, <var 08 E905 ((milady)) ((milord)) /var>?
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_ELEZEN_FEMALE_TYPE2<tab>(-Rough Elezen Female-)Usually, it's me doin' the summons and others doin' the waitin'.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_ELEZEN_FEMALE_TYPE3<tab>(-Serious Elezen Female-)Is there something that I can help you with?
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_ELEZEN_FEMALE_TYPE4<tab>(-Carefree Elezen Female-)Oh, why must you summon me at a time like this...?
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_ELEZEN_FEMALE_TYPE5<tab>(-Independent Elezen Female-)I'm sure there is a perfectly good explanation for this summons.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_ELEZEN_FEMALE_TYPE6<tab>(-Lively Elezen Female-)You know, I thought you might be along to summon me. You may rest assured that I am ready and eager to serve.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_LALAFELL_MALE_TYPE1<tab>(-Polite Lalafellin Male-)Hail to thee, <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sir)) /var>. Your humble servant has heard your summons.

TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_LALAFELL_MALE_TYPE2<tab>(-Rough Lalafellin Male-)Greetin's and salutations, <var 08 E905 ((milady)) ((milord)) /var>. Pray speak yer desires, an' I'll do me damndest to see 'em done.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_LALAFELL_MALE_TYPE3<tab>(-Serious Lalafellin Male-)I was wondering when you'd get around to calling me.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_LALAFELL_MALE_TYPE4<tab>(-Carefree Lalafellin Male-)Mind if we keep this brief? I've got a pretty little thing that's waitin' for me.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_LALAFELL_MALE_TYPE5<tab>(-Independent Lalafellin Male-)What?
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_LALAFELL_MALE_TYPE6<tab>(-Lively Lalafellin Male-)I'm here, I'm here!
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_LALAFELL_FEMALE_TYPE1<tab>(-Polite Lalafellin Female-)Here I am, <var 08 E905 ((Mistress)) ((Master)) /var>, as per your request.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_LALAFELL_FEMALE_TYPE2<tab>(-Rough Lalafellin Female-)'Ello, dearie. What's on the docket?
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_LALAFELL_FEMALE_TYPE3<tab>(-Serious Lalafellin Female-)I never miss a chance to line these pockets.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_LALAFELL_FEMALE_TYPE4<tab>(-Carefree Lalafellin Female-)Well, this is unexpected! What'll it be?
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_LALAFELL_FEMALE_TYPE5<tab>(-Independent Lalafellin Female-)What is it now?
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_LALAFELL_FEMALE_TYPE6<tab>(-Lively Lalafellin Female-)Here I aaaaaam!
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_MIQOTE_MALE_TYPE1<tab>(-Polite Miqo'te Male-)How may I be of serrrvice, <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sir)) /var>?
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_MIQOTE_MALE_TYPE2<tab>(-Rough Miqo'te Male-)It's a war out there, <var 08 E905 ((miss)) ((sir)) /var>. You have no idea.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_MIQOTE_MALE_TYPE3<tab>(-Serious Miqo'te Male-)...
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_MIQOTE_MALE_TYPE4<tab>(-Carefree Miqo'te Male-)Business or pleasure?
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_MIQOTE_MALE_TYPE5<tab>(-Independent Miqo'te Male-)I presume you did not summon me solely for the pleasure of my company.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_MIQOTE_MALE_TYPE6<tab>(-Lively Miqo'te Male-)Just the <var 08 E905 ((fair maiden)) ((handsome fellow)) /var> I was hoping to see! Tell me your heart's desire.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_MIQOTE_FEMALE_TYPE1<tab>(-Polite Miqo'te Female-)I hope your catcall is not one of disapproval.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_MIQOTE_FEMALE_TYPE2<tab>(-Rough Miqo'te Female-)Ye rang, <var 08 E905 ((milady)) ((milord)) /var>?
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_MIQOTE_FEMALE_TYPE3<tab>(-Serious Miqo'te Female-)A cat's ears do not miss much―least of all a summons.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_MIQOTE_FEMALE_TYPE4<tab>(-Carefree Miqo'te Female-)Curiosity called the cat. What do you have for me today?
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_MIQOTE_FEMALE_TYPE5<tab>(-Independent Miqo'te Female-)Ready when you are.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_MIQOTE_FEMALE_TYPE6<tab>(-Lively Miqo'te Female-)I was just thinking of you!
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_ROEGADYN_MALE_TYPE1<tab>(-Polite Roegadyn Male-)What need have you of me today, <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sir)) /var>?
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_ROEGADYN_MALE_TYPE2<tab>(-Rough Roegadyn Male-)Bwahahaha! Ye got work needs gettin' done? Just point me in the right bloody direction.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_ROEGADYN_MALE_TYPE3<tab>(-Serious Roegadyn Male-)I've come. What is it?
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_ROEGADYN_MALE_TYPE4<tab>(-Carefree Roegadyn Male-)Hey there─hic─<var 08 E905 ((missy)) ((mate)) /var>! Care to join me fer a pint?
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_ROEGADYN_MALE_TYPE5<tab>(-Independent Roegadyn Male-)Couldn't come no quicker. Where's the work?
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_ROEGADYN_MALE_TYPE6<tab>(-Lively Roegadyn Male-)I came runnin' soon as I heard the bell! Ye need somethin', chief?
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_ROEGADYN_FEMALE_TYPE1<tab>(-Polite Roegadyn Female-)I am at your disposal, <var 08 E905 ((milady)) ((milord)) /var>.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_ROEGADYN_FEMALE_TYPE2<tab>(-Rough Roegadyn Female-)Ye got somethin' fer me, cap'n?
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_ROEGADYN_FEMALE_TYPE3<tab>(-Serious Roegadyn Female-)Go ahead, <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sir)) /var>.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_ROEGADYN_FEMALE_TYPE4<tab>(-Carefree Roegadyn Female-)Let's keep this short and sweet, shall we?
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_ROEGADYN_FEMALE_TYPE5<tab>(-Independent Roegadyn Female-)This wouldn't be necessary if you entrusted your financial affairs to me.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_ROEGADYN_FEMALE_TYPE6<tab>(-Lively Roegadyn Female-)So─sellin', buyin', drinkin', whorin'? What's it to be today?
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_AURA_MALE_TYPE1<tab>(-Polite Auri Male-)Greetings, <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sir)) /var>. How may I be of service?
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_AURA_MALE_TYPE2<tab>(-Rough Auri Male-)What'll it be, <var 08 E905 ((miss)) ((mate)) /var>?
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_AURA_MALE_TYPE3<tab>(-Serious Auri Male-)State your business.

TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_AURA_MALE_TYPE4<tab>(-Carefree Auri Male-)And how does this wonderful <var 08 E3E90C0D ((<var 08 E3E90C05 ((evening)) ((day)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E3E90C12 ((day)) ((evening)) /var>)) /var> find you?
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_AURA_MALE_TYPE5<tab>(-Independent Auri Male-)Well... Here I am...<var 08 E905 ((Mistress)) ((Master)) /var>.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_AURA_MALE_TYPE6<tab>(-Lively Auri Male-)We work the market stalls,♪ And our uniforms are pretty;♪ We are sober men and true,♪ And attentive to our duties!♪
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_AURA_FEMALE_TYPE1<tab>(-Polite Auri Female-)<var 08 E905 ((My lady)) ((My lord)) /var>. What would you ask of me?
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_AURA_FEMALE_TYPE2<tab>(-Rough Auri Female-)So. We doing this?
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_AURA_FEMALE_TYPE3<tab>(-Serious Auri Female-)Yes?
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_AURA_FEMALE_TYPE4<tab>(-Carefree Auri Female-)Hey, it's...it's you! Hello again, you!
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_AURA_FEMALE_TYPE5<tab>(-Independent Auri Female-)I-It's not like I want to sell your items or anything.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_AURA_FEMALE_TYPE6<tab>(-Lively Auri Female-)What do you have for me? Come on, come on! Don't be shy!
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_HROTHGAR_MALE_TYPE1<tab>(-Polite Hrothgar Male-)You rang, <var 08 E905 ((milady)) ((milord)) /var>?
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_HROTHGAR_MALE_TYPE2<tab>(-Rough Hrothgar Male-)I trust this will be worth my while.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_HROTHGAR_MALE_TYPE3<tab>(-Serious Hrothgar Male-)<var 1A 02 /var>What<var 1A 01 /var>?
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_HROTHGAR_MALE_TYPE4<tab>(-Carefree Hrothgar Male-)Whatever you need, leave it to me! I have my methods.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_HROTHGAR_MALE_TYPE5<tab>(-Independent Hrothgar Male-)Gahaha! If it isn't my favorite <var 08 E905 ((mistress)) ((master)) /var>!
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_HROTHGAR_MALE_TYPE6<tab>(-Lively Hrothgar Male-)It is I, your most loyal and capable retainer!
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_VIERA_FEMALE_TYPE1<tab>(-Polite Viera Female-)What will it be, love?
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_VIERA_FEMALE_TYPE2<tab>(-Rough Viera Female-)Your orders! I would hear them at once!
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_VIERA_FEMALE_TYPE3<tab>(-Serious Viera Female-)If there is something you would ask of me, then ask it.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_VIERA_FEMALE_TYPE4<tab>(-Carefree Viera Female-)Yes...? Is there something you─<yawn>─need?
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_VIERA_FEMALE_TYPE5<tab>(-Independent Viera Female-)A task for me? I hope it's something fun!
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_VIERA_FEMALE_TYPE6<tab>(-Lively Viera Female-)I am here to do your every bidding, <var 08 E905 ((Mistress)) ((Master)) /var>! Ask of me anything at all!

TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_VIERA_MALE_TYPE1<tab>(-Polite Viera Male-)I have been awaiting your summons, <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sir)) /var>. What would you have of me this fine <var 08 E3E90C0D ((<var 08 E3E90C05 ((evening)) ((morning)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E3E90C12 ((day)) ((evening)) /var>)) /var>?
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_VIERA_MALE_TYPE2<tab>(-Rough Viera Male-)What can I do for ye, yer <var 08 E905 ((ladyship)) ((lordship)) /var>?
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_VIERA_MALE_TYPE3<tab>(-Serious Viera Male-)You called, <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sir)) /var>...?
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_VIERA_MALE_TYPE4<tab>(-Carefree Viera Male-)You─hic─rang?
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_VIERA_MALE_TYPE5<tab>(-Independent Viera Male-)Need my assistance, do you? Let's make this quick, then.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_VIERA_MALE_TYPE6<tab>(-Lively Viera Male-)You have my ear, <var 08 E905 ((milady)) ((milord)) /var>. Both of them, in fact!
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_HYURAN_MALE_TYPE1<tab>(-Polite Hyuran Male-)If that is all, I will take my leave now, <var 08 E905 ((Mistress)) ((Master)) /var>.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_HYURAN_MALE_TYPE2<tab>(-Rough Hyuran Male-)Take care o' yerself, hear?
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_HYURAN_MALE_TYPE3<tab>(-Serious Hyuran Male-)Until we next meet.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_HYURAN_MALE_TYPE4<tab>(-Carefree Hyuran Male-)Well, it's about time. Good-bye.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_HYURAN_MALE_TYPE5<tab>(-Independent Hyuran Male-)I believe thanks are in order.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_HYURAN_MALE_TYPE6<tab>(-Lively Hyuran Male-)I'm off, then!
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_HYURAN_FEMALE_TYPE1<tab>(-Polite Hyuran Female-)With your leave, my <var 08 E905 ((lady)) ((lord)) /var>.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_HYURAN_FEMALE_TYPE2<tab>(-Rough Hyuran Female-)Don't you worry 'bout a thing. I got this.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_HYURAN_FEMALE_TYPE3<tab>(-Serious Hyuran Female-)Farewell, then.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_HYURAN_FEMALE_TYPE4<tab>(-Carefree Hyuran Female-)If there is nothing else, <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sir)) /var>, I'll be going now.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_HYURAN_FEMALE_TYPE5<tab>(-Independent Hyuran Female-)Is that all? Very well, until next time.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_HYURAN_FEMALE_TYPE6<tab>(-Lively Hyuran Female-)Oh, will that be all today? Very well, but promise me you'll come back soon!
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_ELEZEN_MALE_TYPE1<tab>(-Polite Elezen Male-)As always, <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sir)) /var>, it has been an honor and a privilege.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_ELEZEN_MALE_TYPE2<tab>(-Rough Elezen Male-)You can count on me, chief─I know how to get things done.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_ELEZEN_MALE_TYPE3<tab>(-Serious Elezen Male-)Don't be a stranger.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_ELEZEN_MALE_TYPE4<tab>(-Carefree Elezen Male-)I swear it shall be done. Eventually.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_ELEZEN_MALE_TYPE5<tab>(-Independent Elezen Male-)As you wish.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_ELEZEN_MALE_TYPE6<tab>(-Lively Elezen Male-)Capital! I shall carry out your orders forthwith.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_ELEZEN_FEMALE_TYPE1<tab>(-Polite Elezen Female-)I humbly await your next summons, <var 08 E905 ((milady)) ((milord)) /var>.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_ELEZEN_FEMALE_TYPE2<tab>(-Rough Elezen Female-)Don't leave me alone for too long, hear?
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_ELEZEN_FEMALE_TYPE3<tab>(-Serious Elezen Female-)Always a pleasure.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_ELEZEN_FEMALE_TYPE4<tab>(-Carefree Elezen Female-)That will be all, yes? Then if you would excuse me...
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_ELEZEN_FEMALE_TYPE5<tab>(-Independent Elezen Female-)I believe that concludes our dealings for now.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_ELEZEN_FEMALE_TYPE6<tab>(-Lively Elezen Female-)Are you certain you don't desire anything else? Anything at all? Very well, I shall take my leave.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_LALAFELL_MALE_TYPE1<tab>(-Polite Lalafellin Male-)Your every whim shall be swiftly carried out with due care and consideration.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_LALAFELL_MALE_TYPE2<tab>(-Rough Lalafellin Male-)Shouldn't take more than a moment, <var 08 E905 ((milady)) ((milord)) /var>.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_LALAFELL_MALE_TYPE3<tab>(-Serious Lalafellin Male-)I'll be going, then.

TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_LALAFELL_MALE_TYPE4<tab>(-Carefree Lalafellin Male-)Thank the gods we're finished. I've got plans to put my hands in places I've never seen...if you know what I mean.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_LALAFELL_MALE_TYPE5<tab>(-Independent Lalafellin Male-)Be well.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_LALAFELL_MALE_TYPE6<tab>(-Lively Lalafellin Male-)I'm off, I'm off!
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_LALAFELL_FEMALE_TYPE1<tab>(-Polite Lalafellin Female-)Until we meet again!
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_LALAFELL_FEMALE_TYPE2<tab>(-Rough Lalafellin Female-)Blessin's o' the Twelve upon ye.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_LALAFELL_FEMALE_TYPE3<tab>(-Serious Lalafellin Female-)May Nald'thal see fit to fatten our pockets!
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_LALAFELL_FEMALE_TYPE4<tab>(-Carefree Lalafellin Female-)Very good, <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sir)) /var>! Your wish is my command, and so forth.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_LALAFELL_FEMALE_TYPE5<tab>(-Independent Lalafellin Female-)You know how to reach me.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_LALAFELL_FEMALE_TYPE6<tab>(-Lively Lalafellin Female-)Is it time for good-byes already? I'm going to miss you...
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_MIQOTE_MALE_TYPE1<tab>(-Polite Miqo'te Male-)Thy will be done.

TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_MIQOTE_MALE_TYPE2<tab>(-Rough Miqo'te Male-)The markets may be a bleedin' battlefield, but I'm a godsdamned soldier. You can count on me, <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sir)) /var>.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_MIQOTE_MALE_TYPE3<tab>(-Serious Miqo'te Male-)...
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_MIQOTE_MALE_TYPE4<tab>(-Carefree Miqo'te Male-)Why so serrrious? <sigh> So it goes.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_MIQOTE_MALE_TYPE5<tab>(-Independent Miqo'te Male-)I hardly think that warranted my personal appearance, but what is done is done.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_MIQOTE_MALE_TYPE6<tab>(-Lively Miqo'te Male-)Then I have satisfied your every need? Excellent! I do so take pleasure in servicing my clients.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_MIQOTE_FEMALE_TYPE1<tab>(-Polite Miqo'te Female-)Good-bye for now, <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sirrr)) /var>.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_MIQOTE_FEMALE_TYPE2<tab>(-Rough Miqo'te Female-)Right then, let's get on with it!
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_MIQOTE_FEMALE_TYPE3<tab>(-Serious Miqo'te Female-)There is no call for concerrrn.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_MIQOTE_FEMALE_TYPE4<tab>(-Carefree Miqo'te Female-)When the master's away, the cat will play.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_MIQOTE_FEMALE_TYPE5<tab>(-Independent Miqo'te Female-)Gods, this is tirin'...
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_MIQOTE_FEMALE_TYPE6<tab>(-Lively Miqo'te Female-)You don't want to be with me anymore? <sniffle>
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_ROEGADYN_MALE_TYPE1<tab>(-Polite Roegadyn Male-)I shall carry out your wishes as instructed, <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sir)) /var>.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_ROEGADYN_MALE_TYPE2<tab>(-Rough Roegadyn Male-)Bwahahaha! I'm in yer bazaar, sellin' yer wares!
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_ROEGADYN_MALE_TYPE3<tab>(-Serious Roegadyn Male-)I will go now.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_ROEGADYN_MALE_TYPE4<tab>(-Carefree Roegadyn Male-)Awww, bugger. Reckon I best get to work...
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_ROEGADYN_MALE_TYPE5<tab>(-Independent Roegadyn Male-)I don't do good-byes.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_ROEGADYN_MALE_TYPE6<tab>(-Lively Roegadyn Male-)Go and grab yourself some shut-eye, chief. You look terrible!
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_ROEGADYN_FEMALE_TYPE1<tab>(-Polite Roegadyn Female-)Will that be all for today, <var 08 E905 ((milady)) ((milord)) /var>? Understood.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_ROEGADYN_FEMALE_TYPE2<tab>(-Rough Roegadyn Female-)Aye, aye, cap'n!
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_ROEGADYN_FEMALE_TYPE3<tab>(-Serious Roegadyn Female-)Duly noted.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_ROEGADYN_FEMALE_TYPE4<tab>(-Carefree Roegadyn Female-)Not exactly how I was hopin' to spend my day, but I suppose it can't be helped.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_ROEGADYN_FEMALE_TYPE5<tab>(-Independent Roegadyn Female-)Ours is not to reason why. Ours is but to do and die.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_ROEGADYN_FEMALE_TYPE6<tab>(-Lively Roegadyn Female-)Ever the consummate professional, I see. Another time, then.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_AURA_MALE_TYPE1<tab>(-Polite Auri Male-)If there is nothing else, then I shall take my leave.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_AURA_MALE_TYPE2<tab>(-Rough Auri Male-)Is that all? Guess I'll be on my way, then.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_AURA_MALE_TYPE3<tab>(-Serious Auri Male-)Any last requests? Very well. Heh heh heh... Ahem.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_AURA_MALE_TYPE4<tab>(-Carefree Auri Male-)Ah, yes, of course. Duty calls!
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_AURA_MALE_TYPE5<tab>(-Independent Auri Male-)You are finished with me, then?
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_AURA_MALE_TYPE6<tab>(-Lively Auri Male-)Here today and gone tomorrow;♪ Yes, I know─♪ That is so!♪
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_AURA_FEMALE_TYPE1<tab>(-Polite Auri Female-)If ever you have need of me, just ring.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_AURA_FEMALE_TYPE2<tab>(-Rough Auri Female-)Always a pleasure, <var 08 E905 ((Mistress)) ((Master)) /var>.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_AURA_FEMALE_TYPE3<tab>(-Serious Auri Female-)Right, then.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_AURA_FEMALE_TYPE4<tab>(-Carefree Auri Female-)Finished already? Guess that's that, then.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_AURA_FEMALE_TYPE5<tab>(-Independent Auri Female-)You're leaving already? Fine, then! I-It's not like I wanted you to stay or anything.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_AURA_FEMALE_TYPE6<tab>(-Lively Auri Female-)Very good, <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sir)) /var>! Very good indeed!
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_HROTHGAR_MALE_TYPE1<tab>(-Polite Hrothgar Male-)Always a pleasure to serve, <var 08 E905 ((milady)) ((milord)) /var>.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_HROTHGAR_MALE_TYPE2<tab>(-Rough Hrothgar Male-)Hmph. I hope that next time you will have a more meaningful task for me.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_HROTHGAR_MALE_TYPE3<tab>(-Serious Hrothgar Male-)<var 1A 02 /var>Good-bye<var 1A 01 /var>.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_HROTHGAR_MALE_TYPE4<tab>(-Carefree Hrothgar Male-)And with that, I shall be off. Places to go, people to see.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_HROTHGAR_MALE_TYPE5<tab>(-Indepedent Hrothgar Male-)Bahahaha! Till next time, my friend!
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_HROTHGAR_MALE_TYPE6<tab>(-Lively Hrothgar Male-)Ring for me whenever you please! You know that I will never let you down!
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_VIERA_FEMALE_TYPE1<tab>(-Polite Viera Female-)Must we part so soon?
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_VIERA_FEMALE_TYPE2<tab>(-Rough Viera Female-)And I am off!
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_VIERA_FEMALE_TYPE3<tab>(-Serious Viera Female-)Call on me as you please. If I am so inclined, I will answer.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_VIERA_FEMALE_TYPE4<tab>(-Carefree Viera Female-)That is all, I suppose...? <yawn> Very well...
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_VIERA_FEMALE_TYPE5<tab>(-Indepedent Viera Female-)That is all? Oh, I was hoping there'd be more...
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_VIERA_FEMALE_TYPE6<tab>(-Lively Viera Female-)Is that all you need of me? But I could yet serve you in so many ways!
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_VIERA_MALE_TYPE1<tab>(-Polite Viera Male-)Do not hesitate to call upon me again. Fare you well in your endeavors, <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sir)) /var>.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_VIERA_MALE_TYPE2<tab>(-Rough Viera Male-)Just say the word, yer <var 08 E905 ((ladyship)) ((lordship)) /var>, and I'll be here with bells on.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_VIERA_MALE_TYPE3<tab>(-Serious Viera Male-)If you have no further need of my services...
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_VIERA_MALE_TYPE4<tab>(-Carefree Viera Male-)I'm off for another glass, then. You know where to find me!
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_VIERA_MALE_TYPE5<tab>(-Independent Viera Male-)What─is that it? Are you <var 1A 02 /var>sure<var 1A 01 /var> you need a retainer?
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_VIERA_MALE_TYPE6<tab>(-Lively Viera Male-)Nothing else? Then I shall be hopping along.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_RETAINER_ORDER_FAILED_NO_CHARGE<tab>You cannot perform this action until you have purchased the services of an additional retainer.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_REMOVE_INVENTORY_EXPLANATION<tab>You cannot release retainers while they are in possession of any items or gil.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_MAIN_MENU_EXPLANATION_01<tab>What would you like to know?
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_RETAINER_REMOVE_FAILED<tab>You were unable to release that retainer.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_RETAINER_CREATE_FAILED<tab>Your application for a retainer was denied.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_RETAINER_CALL_FAILED<tab>Your retainer could not be summoned.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_REGISTER_MARKET_FAILED<tab>The retainer was unable to make the trip.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_RETAINER_NAME_TOO_SHORT<tab>Nicknames must be between 3 and 20 characters.
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_RETAINER_CONTRACT_ENDED<tab>This retainer's contract has been suspended.
